oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Barriers to the adoption of organic farming in the European Union: Press release.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jones, Mr Philip
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Press release announcing the publication of a new report into the Barriers to the adoption of organic farming in the European Union, published as CAS Report 16 by the Centre for Agricultural Strategy.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Jones, Mr Philip (2006) Barriers to the adoption of organic farming in the European Union: Press release. The University of Reading, Centre for Agricultural Strategy.
